Class: Crdt

cloudstate.crdt~ Crdt

A CRDT entity.

new Crdt(desc, serviceName [, options])

Create a CRDT entity.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
desc string | Array.<string>

The file name of a protobuf descriptor or set of descriptors containing the CRDT service.
serviceName string

The fully qualified name of the gRPC service that this CRDT implements.
options module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~options <optional>

The options.

Extends

  • module:cloudstate.Entity

Members

commandHandlers :Object.<string, module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~commandHandler>

The command handlers.

The names of the properties must match the names of the service calls specified in the gRPC descriptor for this CRDTs service.

Type:
  • Object.<string, module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~commandHandler>

defaultValue :module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~defaultValueCallback

A callback that is invoked to create a default value if the CloudState proxy doesn't send an existing one.

Type:
  • module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~defaultValueCallback

onStateSet :module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~onStateSetCallback

A callback that is invoked whenever the state is set for this CRDT.

This is invoked whenever a new state is set on the CRDT, to allow the state to be enriched with domain specific properties and methods. This may be due to the state being set explicitly from a command handler on the command context, or implicitly as the default value, or implicitly when a new state is received from the proxy.

Type:
  • module:cloudstate.crdt.Crdt~onStateSetCallback

Methods

lookupType(messageType)

Lookup a Protobuf message type.

This is provided as a convenience to lookup protobuf message types for use, for example, as values in sets and maps.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
messageType string

The fully qualified name of the type to lookup.

Type Definitions

commandHandler(command, context)

A command handler callback.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
command Object

The command message, this will be of the type of the gRPC service call input type.
context module:cloudstate.crdt.CrdtCommandContext

The command context.
Returns:

The message to reply with, it must match the gRPC service call output type for this command.

Type
undefined | Object

defaultValueCallback(entityId)

A callback that is invoked to create a default value if the CloudState proxy doesn't send an existing one.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
entityId string

The id of the entity.
Returns:

The default value to use for this entity.

Type
Object

onStateSetCallback(state, entityId)

A state set handler callback.

This is invoked whenever a new state is set on the CRDT, to allow the state to be enriched with domain specific properties and methods. This may be due to the state being set explicitly from a command handler on the command context, or implicitly as the default value, or implicitly when a new state is received from the proxy.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
state module:cloudstate.crdt.CrdtState

The state that was set.
entityId string

The id of the entity.

options

Options for creating a CRDT entity.

Properties:
Name Type Description
includeDirs array.<string>

The directories to include when looking up imported protobuf files.
persistenceId string

The "persistence" id of this entity, used to namespace entities of different CRDT types in the same service.
